para.text: The air dryer is used to remove moisture, hot and humid air from the machine. Thus cooling the hot and humid air from the air dyer inside. (Refer to

li.text: he air dryer uses fluorocarbon (HFC) as refrigerant.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: It is strictly forbidden to emit fluorocarbon into the atmosphere. Before you repair the refrigerant circuit, you should collect the refrigerant with proper evacuation system. The collected refrigerant should be properly recycled by qualified agency. Only personnel with proper credential are allowed to handle refrigerant.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-11px; margin-top:8px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:11px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:117px left ;
li.text: nly properly trained and qualified personnel are allowed to remove the cover panel of the equipment.
